name: Golurk
description: The Automaton Pokémon. It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: When attacking with a punch-based move (Mega Punch, Dynamic Punch, Ice/Fire/Thunder Punch, etc.), this Pokémon may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot hold an item.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Any attack made by or against this Pokémon has advantage.
